Comment: Abilities: Amfl (Mana Flare), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Causes the Faerie Dragon to channel negative magical energies that damage nearby enemies when they cast spells. Also increases the Faerie Dragon's armor by 20. |n|nLasts 15 seconds.|nDeals 0.65 damage per point of mana.|n50 second cooldown.
